note.p: Birth: The How, Applethwaite, Westmoreland, England (06 August 1741)
Education: BA (1761) MA (1764), Peterhouse College, Cambridge

Career: Entered Middle Temple (1763); Fellow of Peterhouse College, Cambridge (1764); called to the Bar (1766); Judge in the Court of Common Pleas (1786); Commissioner of the Great Seal (1792); friend of Richard Watson, Bishop of Llandaff (FRS 1769)
